SELECT t1.ORDERID, t1.FID, t1.ORDERNUMBER, t1.PRODUCTNUMBER, t1.PRODUCTNAME, t1.SELF, t1.SELFFINISH, t1.SELFGOOD,t1.EACH, t1.EACHFINISH, t1.EACHGOOD FROM VW_SYX_ZLGL_CPWCL t1 WHERE t1.FID = #{item.fid}
AND ( t1.ORDERNUMBER LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{item.productName}),'%') OR t1.PRODUCTNUMBER LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{item.productName}),'%') )
AND( t1.EACHFINISH = 0 AND t1.SELFFINISH = 0 )
AND ( (t1.EACHFINISH > 0 and (t1.EACHFINISH < t1.EACH)) OR (t1.SELFFINISH > 0 and t1.SELFFINISH < t1.SELF) )
AND( t1.EACHFINISH= t1.EACH AND t1.SELFFINISH = t1.SELF )
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM VW_SYX_ZLGL_CPWCL t1 WHERE t1.FID = #{fid} AND ( (t1.EACHFINISH > 0 and (t1.EACHFINISH < t1.EACH)) OR (t1.SELFFINISH > 0 and t1.SELFFINISH < t1.SELF) )
